title: Game refuses to let me play no matter what I do.
body: No matter what I try: restarting client many times, waiting many minutes, reinstallation, etc. this damn message won't disappear and it won't let me queue into a game. What the hell is going on? https://i.imgur.com/MvVhjL6.png

replies.body: Sometimes if your network's connection with our servers goes into a type of dormant state, that play button will gray out because it knows it can't reliably get you connected to any games. Try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can smooth out any bumps along the way. Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help much!
Hm... have you tried a client repair? This is really strange, haven't seen it much.
